short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension aiming to simplify the surplus of tabs in one's browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension aims to simplify your mess of tabs by allowing you to quickly group and reopen tabs. Simply use the control key to highlight the tabs you'd like to save, title your tab group within the Keeping Tabs extension, and add it to your collection of tabs. These groups of tabs can be opened individually or all at once, making it much easier to organize projects within your browser.
